creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
build.properties.sample and test/build.properties.sample reference obsolete versions in the paths for 
required jars.  For example, it specifies "jakarta-oro-2.0.5" when "jakarta-oro-2.0.8" is the current 
release.  In addition, all the paths were relative to /java which seems unusual.  I've changed it so that all 
are relative to ${lib.home.dir} which is by default set to the users home directory.  That should allow those 
who expand the current versions of the dependencies to the home directory to be able to just copy 
build.properties.sample to build.properties and go.
